getAll.description: Use this to list all event templates owned by your app.

create.description: Event templates define the general structure for a custom timeline event.

update.description: Updates an existing template and its tokens.

delete.description: This will delete the event template. All associated events will be removed from search results and the timeline UI.

createToken.description: Adds a token to an existing event template.

updateToken.description: This will update the existing token on an event template. Name and type can't be changed on existing tokens.

deleteToken.description: This will remove the token from an existing template.

createEvent.description: Creates an instance of a timeline event based on an event template.

batchCreateEvent.description: Creates multiple instances of timeline events based on an event template.

getEvent.description: This returns the previously created event. It contains all existing info for the event, but not necessarily the CRM object.

getEventDetail.description: This will take the detailTemplate from the event template and return an object rendering the specified event.

getEventHtmlHeader.description: This will take either the headerTemplate from the event template and render for the specified event as HTML.

getEventHtmlDetail.description: This will take either the detailTemplate from the event template and render for the specified event as HTML.
